rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGX9660} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {MBA571, MBA5710, MBA5710A, MBA5711, MBA6330, MBA6770, MGF5171, MGF5171%, MGX5171, MGX5171%}

unitName: Managing the multinational enterprise: cases and issues
description: Issues include the impact of culture on management and the convergence-divergence debate; centralisation versus decentralisation of decision making; standardisation versus differentiation of management activities; control versus delegation; and, competition versus partnership: new international organisation forms and implications for management.
